message: Why did the pizza get detention? It had too many toppings and couldn't keep it together!
What's a sunny-side-up egg's favorite day of the week? Fry-day!
How do you organize a great Taco Tuesday? You shell-abrate!
Why are rockets always a hit at parties? Because they knew how to launch the fun!
How do you organize a space party? You planet!
Why did the bicycle fall over? Because it was two-tired!
Why do balloons always bring a smile to the party? Because they're air-resistible!
What do you call a coat that has lots of stories to tell? A tale-coat!
What was the secret to the bee's success? It always bee-haves!
